lines.text: Let's stick out your tongue. We'll see if it's coated.

[Sticks out tongue, it has a small coat on]
And two pairs of pants, doc.
[Bugs sticks out tongue two more times, each time with a different pair of pants]
Stop! One more step and I'll blow ya up! This contains manganese, phosphorous, folic acid and dextrose.

[Laughs]
That is the formula for a chocolate malted.

[Drinks it]
Yum, yum! I'm a better scientist than I thought.

[the experiment results in him changing bodies with the chicken]
In our next experiment we shall reverse the procedure - I hope.
Looks like Doc is a victim of fowl play.

[Italian accent, speaking English]
And now wee will turn zee rabbeet eento a cheecken.

[jumps up and starts backing away, after hearing the scientific test's secret plan, Bugs is shocked]
Chicken? That's out, Doc! I don't wanna be no chicken!
Yes you do! Come here! Come here! Come back here!
